msbt.message: This whole place is all me. I just can't get comfy unless I've got my favorite things nearby.Like they say, "Home is where your stuff is."

Whaddaya think? <20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />I absolutely love my . It's so comfy!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Doesn't matter what kind of day I've had, the instant I fall into this bad boyI'm out like a light.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I've been watching soooo many shopping shows on my .The hosts are hilarious. They always get so excited over the tiniest little things. I'm kinda hooked!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I'm also broke right now, so I don't even THINK about buying anything, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />There is NOTHING better than cranking some on my .<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />My parents used to complain about the noise soooo much, but they're not here now! Bwa ha ha!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I'm terrible at being on time to stuff, but stillI hate needing .Don't get me wrong, <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I'm still late all the time, but now I'm actually trying, !
Plants are so awesome. You get out exactly what you put in. If they're doing well, you're doing well!I take care of my own!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" /> Just look at my , growin' like mad.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I like to grab a book to read in my .<20_3 arg="3" />Sometimes I'll turn on the water and start reading, <20_3 arg="6" />and the next thing I know, it'll be overflowing.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />When you need a place to pile up your unopened mail,<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" /> nothing beats .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />When it comes to looking rad, nothing can beat my !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />But when it comes to being comfy to sit onnot so much, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I'm gonna get this out of the way That was a gift. Don't ask me to play .<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />It's too bad, 'cause I really wanted to learn. I tried! ButI just didn't stick with it, .
<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />I'm so glad I got .<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />Whipping something up is a breeze, . Cooking's a blast now!
<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />I really wish I used my more often, .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Staying fit's tough, y'know? I just can't seem to make it a habit, but I keep trying!

<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />I do a ton of gardening, so I know which outdoor stuff is worth it, like ! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />And yeah, my place looks kinda weird with outdoor stuff indoors, but trust meâ€”it's awesome, !
<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />I still don't really know why I got .<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />Someone told me the extra light would make my place look bigger, butI'm not feelin' it, .
<20_3 arg="6" /><20_2 arg="10" />I'm so glad I bought myself .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Nobody's gonna laugh harder at my legendarily awful bed head more than me, . Bwa ha ha!
<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />Oh, hey! You lookin' at my ?<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />Yeah, I used to let my clothes pile up on a chair or a table Now I let 'em pile up in there, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Oh, hey! Whaddaya think of my ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I tell that bug everything. Everything! I mean, like, if that bug ever learns to talk, Yikes!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Are you checking out my sweet ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I like to kinda zen out watching her in there. Some days that's just what I need, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Pretty cool, huh? I love staring at my .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I just find itcalming. Doesn't matter what kind of day I've had, it chills me out, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Cool, huh? I gotta be honest, at first I wasn't sure where I was gonna put my .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Now it's kinda like the center of my world. It just gives my place this rad sense of, uhgravity, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /> was saying my is fake.I was like, of COURSE it's fake! What kind of do you think I am?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I can barely tell art from a hole in the ground. Why waste the real deal on me, ? That'd be nuts.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />As hot as this place gets sometimes, you'd better believe I keep around.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Hitting a button to cool off on a scorcher? Yeah, I'm not about to pass that up, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I've been getting attitude from my lately.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Like, the way it was swaying in the water the other night? Total sass. It was hilarious, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />That photo of me is from my going- away party. That was a week before I shipped out on the getaway package.<20_3 arg="3" />I wanted to have, like, a record of how I looked before I hit the islands.<20_3 arg="6" />This was a really huge shift for me. Looking at that photo reminds me of just how far I've come, .

<20_3 arg="6" /><20_2 arg="9" />Maybe it's weird, but I really can't remember a time when I didn't have .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I've been playing with those since I was still a tiny little anklebiter. Still do now and then, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I've totally lost track of how many hours I've spent messing with my .<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />Seriously, I've lost, like, entire weeks, Worth it!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />My best friend used to say you really don't live somewhere until you set up .<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />And she was right! This place really feels like home now, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I really wasn't sure if I could afford .<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />But then I was like, I really oughta treat myself more. Totally the right call, !
